titles.title: Colonel Mary Louise Rasmuson Campus of the Alaska VA Healthcare System Act of 2022
Colonel Mary Louise Rasmuson Campus of the Alaska VA Healthcare System Act of 2022
Colonel Mary Louise Rasmuson Campus of the Alaska VA Healthcare System Act of 2022
Colonel Mary Louise Rasmuson Campus of the Alaska VA Healthcare System Act of 2022
Colonel Mary Louise Rasmuson Campus of the Alaska VA Healthcare System Act of 2022

A bill to designate the medical center of the Department of Veterans Affairs located in Anchorage, Alaska, as the "Colonel Mary Louise Rasmuson Campus of the Alaska VA Healthcare System", and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. Takano moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 5016.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
Colonel Mary Louise Rasmuson Campus of the Alaska VA Healthcare System Act of 2022
This act designates the medical center of the Department of Veterans Affairs in Anchorage, Alaska, as the Colonel Mary Louise Rasmuson Campus of the Alaska VA Healthcare System.
